article_title: Richmond Times-Dispatch: Political Commentary From Jeff Schapiro

og.description: What McAuliffe doesn't know or hasn't mastered about Virginia's political history and its quirky election schedule undercuts his effectiveness - no matter how many millions he raises or headlines he generates.
og.title: Schapiro: McAuliffe's even steeper learning curve
